analysis: The project appears to be a web application with a desert/Egyptian theme. The current files include HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the main website, as well as additional files for GitHub Pages and documentation. The existing to-dos indicate that there are issues with mobile responsiveness, button functionality, and theme consistency. The event request specifically asks for a mordenui-egypt-lightcolour-desert-mobileresponsive-clean theme with working buttons.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include an Egyptian-themed color palette with light desert colors such as sandy beige, warm gold, and soft terracotta. Ensure the theme is clean and consistent across all UI elements.
Ensure all buttons in the HTML are functional and properly styled according to the Egyptian-themed color palette. Add hover and active states for better user interaction.
Fix the mobile menu toggle functionality to ensure it works smoothly. Implement proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions for the mobile navigation menu.
Add responsive design elements to ensure the website is mobile-friendly. Include media queries to adjust layout, font sizes, and button sizes for different screen sizes.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices. Ensure the navigation is intuitive and easy to use.
